name: Dziob!
description:
That is our first attempt to make a 3D game so it's been a hell of a ride on a learning curve, yet still an amazing experience. It ain't perfect but nothing is, eh?

First time in such a big team and first time coding for some of us.
Our team :
Alicja, Ryju, Pączek, Cebula

Welcome to Dziob!

Your task is to keep you and your eggs alive.

Beware of the farmer trying to steal your eggs and the fox trying to kill you.
To defend your eggs from the farmer try pecking him. When the fox is chasing you, try hiding in the chicken hoot. To increase your hunger bar, find some bugs in the boxes.

In order to hatch your eggs, you need to keep them from getting too cold.

You win if you hatch your lovely eggs.

Controls :

CTRL - Peck / Eat / Warm the egg
Arrows - movement

Quit - ALT + F4
